summary: Tested code splitting (React.lazy), server.py cleanup, and website performance improvements. Fixed a critical bug in Notifications.js where roomInvites variable was undefined after cleanup. All pages load correctly with lazy loading, no room/agora/webrtc errors in console.

fixed_issues.issue: roomInvites variable was undefined - caused runtime error after VibeRooms cleanup
fixed_issues.fix: Removed Room Invites section entirely (lines 226-260) since roomInvites state was never defined

critical_code_review_comments: React.lazy code splitting implemented for ~40 page components in App.js
server.py reduced from 11,753 to 10,616 lines (removed rooms/agora/webrtc)
Notifications.js had leftover roomInvites references - FIXED
Settings.js About section no longer mentions VibeRooms
Bottom navigation correctly shows: Home, Tribes, Resources, Discover, Profile

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all pages load correctly with lazy loading)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Major cleanup completed: 1) React.lazy code splitting for ~40 components, 2) server.py reduced by ~1,137 lines (VibeRooms, Agora.io, WebRTC removed), 3) Fixed Notifications.js roomInvites bug. All pages load correctly. delivery_service runs in MOCK mode.

features_tested.code_splitting: PASSED - React.lazy implemented, pages load on demand
features_tested.resources_page: PASSED - Shows free resources with search and category filters
features_tested.tribes_page: PASSED - Shows tribes list with join/leave functionality
features_tested.discover_page: PASSED - Shows posts/reels/people tabs, no Free Resources button
features_tested.profile_page: PASSED - Shows user profile with posts
features_tested.settings_page: PASSED - All menu items work, About section has no VibeRooms
features_tested.notifications_page: PASSED - Loads correctly after roomInvites fix
features_tested.bottom_navigation: PASSED - Shows Home, Tribes, Resources, Discover, Profile (no Rooms)
features_tested.console_errors: PASSED - No room/agora/webrtc errors in console

performance_improvements.gzip_compression: GZipMiddleware enabled for faster data transfer

mocked_apis.delivery_service: Running in MOCK mode (no API keys)
